description:
The Spradlin Kennedy Law Firm is devoted to helping those in the Kansas City, Missouri, area who have been charged with a crime.Ms. Spradlin and Mr. Kennedy are criminal defense attorneys with years of experience and a successful record representing those in Lee’s Summit, Independence, western Missouri, Kansas and Jackson County in addition to Kansas City. No matter how big or small the offense, misdemeanor or felony, they provide aggressive, experienced representation.

The Spradlin Kennedy Law Firm is committed to giving each client personal attention, because they know these cases are the most important thing going on in your life. Free initial consultations are offered, and the attorneys handle all criminal cases, including assault, check fraud, trespassing, property crimes, drug possession, driving while intoxicated and traffic and municipal violations.

Because of their experience and reputation as one of the most promising criminal defense firms in the region, Ms. Spradlin and Mr. Kennedy understand how a criminal conviction can your life. With a passionate belief that all individuals deserve the chance to have their fair day in court, they vigorously protect your rights and investigate your case fully to ensure you have all the information needed to make an informed decision regarding the outcome of your case.

Ms. Spradlin and Mr. Kennedy know that each client deserves the complete focus of his or her attorney.With a “Client Focused, Results Driven” approach to the practice of law, they strive to always be available for their clients when they are needed.
